name: The Ward (itch) (NephthysGameDev)
description:
Pt-Br : Em uma escola infantil, por toda parte você encontrará espirito tristes por terem visto algo terrível. O que será que eles viram de tão terrível assim? Não sei, mas precisa trazer paz para essas crianças devolvendo os seus brinquedos favoritos.

En: In a children's school, everywhere you will find sad spirits for having seen something terrible. What could they have seen that was so terrible? I don't know, but you need to bring peace to these kids by returning their favorite toys.

controls:

WASD -> MOVE

Space -> Jump

Shit -> Run

R -> Reloard Scene

Enjoy ;)
